django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.adapter
==============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.adapter

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This object provides quoting for GEOS geometries into PostgreSQL/PostGIS.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.postgis.adapter.PostGISAdapter


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: PostGISAdapter(obj, geography=False)

   .. py:attribute:: is_geometry


   .. py:attribute:: srid


   .. py:attribute:: geography
      :value: False



   .. py:method:: getquoted()

      Return a properly quoted string for use in PostgreSQL/PostGIS.
